snippet: Corruption in higher education has been one of the many focal points of President Xi Jinping’s antigraft campaign.
abstract: Chinese government investigations into corruption among officials at country's universities spoils their prior reputation for fairness; push to diversify student bodies at colleges by introducing less quantifiable criteria has led to opportunities for influence-peddling.
lead_paragraph: Corruption in higher education has been one of the many focal points of President Xi Jinping’s antigraft campaign.

headline.print_headline: China Bribes Cast Doubt on College Admissions
headline.main: Bribery Confession in China Calls Into Question Integrity of College Admissions
